Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application

Class CloudContainerPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.HBox
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application.CloudContainerPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableGUI, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CloudContainerPane extends javafx.scene.layout.HBox implements ObservableGUI
This class contains the cloud panes of the game.

  • Field Details

    • observer

      private ObserverGUI observer
      The observer of this GUI element.

    • cloudContainerHeight

      static final double cloudContainerHeight
      The height of the cloud container. It is equal to the height of a cloud.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • cloudContainerWidth

      static final double cloudContainerWidth
      The width of the cloud container. It is greater than the width of four clouds.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • cloudChosen

      private int cloudChosen
      The ID of the chosen cloud.

    • cloudsIDs

      private List<Integer> cloudsIDs
      The ID of the clouds in this container.

    • createClouds

      public void createClouds(int numOfPlayers, List<Integer> clouds)
      Sets an ID to each CloudPane based on the real ID in the server model.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - the number of clouds in this game
      clouds - the IDs of the clouds in the server model

    • updateCloud

      public void updateCloud(Integer cloudID, HashMap<Integer,Color> studs)
      Updates a cloud with the given ID with an updated list of students on it.
      Parameters:
      cloudID - the ID of the cloud to update
      studs - a map with the student IDs and their respective color
